DOC.brief_title: Effects Mulligan Mobilisation Lumbar Flexion Range Asymptomatic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study investigate mechanical effect Mulligan 's `` SNAG '' technique lumbar flexion ROM . The secondary aim measure intra- inter-day reliability lumbar ROM employ procedure . For interventional component study , 49 asymptomatic volunteer participate . Subjects randomly assign either treatment ( SNAG ) group ( n=25 ) , placebo ( SHAM ) group ( n=24 ) . The `` SNAG '' technique apply L3 L4 spinal level experience manual therapist . SNAGs perform active flexion sit , 10 time level . The placebo-SHAM similar SNAG without however apply appropriate direction force . Lumbar ROM measure three dimensional electronic goniometer ( Zebris CM20 ) , technique . For reliability component , five measurement two different day ( one week apart ) perform 20 healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: asymptomatic health individual Low back pain spinal pathology vascular heart problem subject take anticoagulant
